name: Neuron Expert
author: Neuron Expert

sections.description:
The Neuron Expert plugin enables:
– The publication of SEO-optimized articles for your blog, created using the AI platform Neuron Expert.
– Automatically find the best news for your business, rewrite it, translate it, make a video, and publish it.
– Embedding an AI avatar in the chat.

This plugin relies on the Neuron Expert API service.

For more information about the Neuron Expert service, please visit:
– Neuron Expert
– Privacy Policy
– Terms and Conditions

Features

  • Publish SEO-optimized blog posts.
  • Display user news articles.
  • Embed interactive chat buttons and iframes of avatars.
  • Automatically insert selected shortcodes on specific pages.
  • Custom pagination for posts and news.
  • Manage and configure avatars directly from the plugin settings.

Getting Started

Obtain your API Key

  1. Visit the Neuron Expert website: neuron.expert and log in to your account.
  2. Navigate to the settings by clicking on your profile or the settings icon.
  3. Go to the “Connections” section within the settings.
  4. Find the “WordPress Plugin” option and click on it to reveal your unique API key. This key is necessary for the Neuron SEO plugin to communicate with the Neuron Expert service.

Configure the Neuron Expert Plugin

  1. Within your WordPress dashboard, go to the Neuron Expert plugin settings.
  2. Enter the API key you obtained from the Neuron Expert website into the designated field.
  3. Save your changes to ensure the plugin is correctly configured and ready to use.

Using the Plugin

  • Display Blog Posts: Add the shortcode [neuron_blog_shortcode] to the page where you want your posts to appear on your WordPress site.
  • Display News Articles: Add the shortcode [neuron_news_shortcode] to the page where you want your news to appear on your WordPress site.
  • Embed Avatar Iframe: Add the shortcode [neuron_avatar_iframe avatar_id='your_avatar_id'] to the page where you want to embed the avatar’s interface.

Automatic Shortcode Insertion

You can configure the plugin to automatically insert a selected shortcode on a specific page:

  1. Go to the Neuron Expert plugin settings.
  2. Select the shortcode you want to insert.
  3. If you select the Avatar Iframe shortcode, choose the avatar ID from the dropdown list.
  4. Select the page where the shortcode should be inserted.
  5. Save your settings.

Available Shortcodes

  • [neuron_blog_shortcode]: Displays the user’s blog posts.
  • [neuron_news_shortcode]: Displays the user’s news articles.
  • [neuron_avatar_iframe avatar_id='your_avatar_id']: Embeds an iframe with the selected avatar.

Keeping Your API Key Confidential

Remember to keep your API key confidential to protect your account’s security. Do not share your API key publicly.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPL v2 or later. For more information, see the GNU General Public License.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the neuron-posts folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
How do I obtain an API key?

To obtain an API key, follow the steps outlined in the “Getting Started” section. You will need to log in to your account on Neuron Expert, access the “Connections” section in the settings, and locate the “WordPress Plugin” option to find your API key.
sections.changelog:
1.0.6

  • Added features to embed avatars and chat buttons.
  • Enhanced settings page to select and configure shortcodes.
  • Improved pagination for posts and news articles.
  • Various bug fixes and performance improvements.

1.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: This plugin relies on the Neuron Expert API service. A Neuron Expert WordPress plugin to display user posts and more.
